US BANK HOLIDAY: July 4, 2024 – Incoming and outgoing USD payments paused
Bitstamp incoming and outgoing USD payments paused on Thursday, July 4, 2024, due to a public holiday in the US.

Due to the upcoming public holiday (Independence Day) in the US on Thursday, July 4, 2024, Bitstamp’s bank payment clearing system for incoming and outgoing USD payments will not be available.

EUR SEPA transfers, GBP FPS transfers, credit card, Google Pay, Apple Pay, and PayPal transfers will remain unaffected.

If you need any help or additional information, please contact us at support@bitstamp.net.

We wish a happy 4th of July to all our US customers!
US Holiday notice - Incoming & outgoing USD payments paused - 04.07.2024
